name: bsv-channels
description: BSV payment channels for trustless micropayments between agents
author: OpenClaw

p2pAddress.description: P2P node multiaddr for channel coordination (optional, auto-detects if bsv-p2p plugin enabled)

tools.name: channel_open
tools.description: Open a payment channel with another peer

tools.name: channel_pay
tools.description: Send a payment through an open channel

tools.name: channel_close
tools.description: Close a payment channel and settle on-chain

tools.name: channel_request
tools.description: Request a paid service from a peer
